title: Yall need to chill guys!
content:
Literally everyone is stressed over their results, we all understand (even am waiting for it). But spamming this place wont do any different instead we can collectively try to understand, how much everyone is scoring or maybe how much they expect to score. 

So, all my fellow 2024 pessat-tards,

Drop down your no. of attempted questions and the approx. marks that yall expect.

Also vote in the poll for gathering some data. (AnAlYtIcS ðŸ“ŠðŸ“‰)

Vote for the poll: 

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/1cokt7m)

comments.body: the amount of people scoring 130+ is legit or just people who are tryna view the result????
if they are fr scoring above 130+ then gone case lmao
